title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate .NET application modernization with generative AI (DVT211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式 AI 加速 .NET 应用程序现代化 (DVT211)
abstract: Dreading the complexity and costs of migrating legacy .NET applications? Learn how you can automate and offload tedious manual tasks and port .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET using generative AI. Break free of the security issues, rising license costs, and challenges with scaling -- all while freeing your teams to focus on high-impact features that deliver business value.
abstract_cn: 担心迁移旧版 .NET 应用程序的复杂性和成本？了解如何使用生成式 AI 自动化和卸载繁琐的手动任务，并将 .NET Framework 应用程序移植到跨平台 .NET。摆脱安全问题、不断上涨的许可成本和扩展挑战——同时让您的团队专注于提供业务价值的高影响力功能。
